description: Introducing the Pro 1 Diolase Titanium, the most advanced diode laser hair removal technology available today...
additionalInfo: Experience Pro 1 Diolase Titanium at Malva Health & Beauty Center, with triple-wavelength technology and SHR motion...

faq.question: Why choose Pro 1 Diolase Titanium?
faq.answer: Triple-Wavelength Technology, In-motion SHR, Suitable for all skin types, Contact cooling...

faq.question: How does triple-wavelength technology work?
faq.answer: 755nm for fine hair, 808nm for deeper follicles, 1064nm for dark skin tones and dense hair...

faq.question: What are the advantages?
faq.answer: Efficiency, Comfort, Speed, Versatility. Full body in 30 minutes. Virtually painless...
